title: Manager demonstrates ChickenMax democratic model to curious community
description: Manager demonstrates ChickenMax democratic model to curious community
content:
Scenario: Manager demonstrates ChickenMax democratic model to curious community
    Given community members are curious about worker ownership
    And Marcus has visible coordinator role in community institution
    When community members ask about democratic business model
    Then Marcus explains transformation from corporate extraction to worker ownership
    And Marcus emphasizes workers govern, he coordinates with their consent
    And Marcus's transparency about coordinator vs. owner role educates community
    And community sees democratic governance as viable alternative
    And other small businesses consider conversion after seeing example
